casebody.data:
Eric P. SOUSA
v.
Donna M. SOUSA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2017

C. Michael Budlong and Brandon B. Fontaine, in support of the petition.

William J. Ward, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 755, 164 A.3d 702 (2017), is denied.
